WizardTD

Class Fireball

  • java.lang.Object
    • WizardTD.Fireball

  • public class Fireball
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fireball(float x, float y, processing.core.PApplet app, processing.core.PImage fbImg, int speed, Enemy toTrack, float dmg)
      Constructor called whenever Fireball object is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkHit()
      Calls reachTarget() function, if true, causes enemy to take dmg according to the fireball dmg multiplied by the enemy armor, obtained using Enemy class getArmour() function.
      void display()
      Displays the fireball image at its x and y positions as long as the enemy it is tracking is not dead by checking using the isDead() function in the Enemy class.
      void ff()
      Sets the ffed value to true, and sets speed to the fast forwarded speed.
      boolean getActive()
      Returns the value of the isActive attribute.
      float getX()
      Returns the value of the x attribute.
      float getY()
      Returns the value of the y attribute.
      void pause()
      Sets the paused value to true, and sets speed to the pausespeed.
      boolean reachTarget()
      Checks whether the fireball x and y position has reached the enemy sprite position.
      void shoot()
      First checks if the fireball has reached the target and hit, then sets target to the enemy x and y position using the Enemy class getter functions.
      void unff()
      Sets the ffed value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.
      void unpause()
      Sets the paused value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fireball

        public Fireball(float x,
                float y,
                processing.core.PApplet app,
                processing.core.PImage fbImg,
                int speed,
                Enemy toTrack,
                float dmg)
        Constructor called whenever Fireball object is created.
        Parameters:
        x - float indicating x position.
        y - float indicating y position.
        app - a reference of PApplet passed to allow this class to call relevant drawing functions.
        fbImg - PImage of the sprite.
        speed - float indicating movement speed of the fireball.
        toTrack - reference of the Enemy object that this fireball is aiming at.
        dmg - float indicating how much to reduce enemy health by if hit.

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public void shoot()
        First checks if the fireball has reached the target and hit, then sets target to the enemy x and y position using the Enemy class getter functions. Then calculates the direction and then moves towards the target at the speed set by the speed attribute, by continuously changing the x and y positions.

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays the fireball image at its x and y positions as long as the enemy it is tracking is not dead by checking using the isDead() function in the Enemy class.

      • reachTarget

        public boolean reachTarget()
        Checks whether the fireball x and y position has reached the enemy sprite position.
        Returns:
        true if x and y positions match, otherwise false.

      • checkHit

        public void checkHit()
        Calls reachTarget() function, if true, causes enemy to take dmg according to the fireball dmg multiplied by the enemy armor, obtained using Enemy class getArmour() function. Otherwise, does nothing.

      • getActive

        public boolean getActive()
        Returns the value of the isActive attribute.
        Returns:
        boolean of fireball isActive value.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Sets the paused value to true, and sets speed to the pausespeed.

      • unpause

        public void unpause()
        Sets the paused value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.

      • ff

        public void ff()
        Sets the ffed value to true, and sets speed to the fast forwarded speed.

      • unff

        public void unff()
        Sets the ffed value to false, and sets speed to the normal speed.

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Returns the value of the x attribute.
        Returns:
        float of the x value

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Returns the value of the y attribute.
        Returns:
        float of the y value
